input.sentences: i have risen from the sea .
my journey was long and hard .
i had to wrestle with a family of sharks in order to get to shore .
my crew has been stuck at sea for a whole month .
i hope i can get back to them in time to show them i actually could make the swim to shore unscathed .
output.sentences: The sea had risen over the morning and caught us by surprise.
It had been a long and hard journey to get back.
We had to wrestle shark and jump other hurdles just to make it to shore.
Being stuck at sea for more than a month will change you forever.
But the sea remains unscathed over endless time, waiting for another unwitting swimmer.
